mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from am_collection_source_monitor
order by ${orderByClause}
select DISTINCT source_id from am_collection_source_monitor where info_type='FM';
SELECT heartbeat_time FROM am_collection_source_monitor WHERE source_id = #{sourceId} AND info_type='FM'
mapper.insert: insert into am_collection_source_monitor (source_id, info_type, check_point, alarm_seq, heartbeat_time, update_time,fm_last_submit_time,send_active_alarm_time,send_clear_alarm_time, if_uncleared_disconnect_alarm, if_uncleared_idle_alarm,current_idle_alarm_duration ) values (#{sourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{infoType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkPoint,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{alarmSeq,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{heartbeatTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fmLastSubmitTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{sendActiveAlarmTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{sendClearAlarmTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{ifUnclearedDisconnectedAlarm,jdbcType=BIT},#{ifUnclearedIdleAlarm,jdbcType=BIT}, #{currentIdleAlarmDuration,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
